src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Dushanba kuni Shvetsiya Fanlar akademiyasi adabiyot bo'yicha Nobel mukofoti qo'mitasining doimiy kotibasi Sara Danius Shetsiyaning Sveriges radiosidagi dastur davomida qo'mitaning adabiyot bo'yicha 2016-yili Nobel mukofotini yutganlik to'g'risida to'g'ridan-to'g'ri Bob Dilan bilan bog'lana olmagandan keyin u bilan bog'lanish bo'yicha urinishlarini to'xtatganligini ommaviy tarzda e'lon qildi.
hyp_text: Shanba kuni, Shved Akademiyasi adabiyot bo'yicha Nobel mukofoti raisi Sara Danius, Sveriges Radio telekanali orqali Shvetsiya radiosi dasturida xalqaro e'lon qildi. Ular Bob Dileni 2016-yilda adabiyot bo'yicha Nobel mukofotini qo'ldirganliklarini e'lon qildilar, chunki ular uni direktga aloqaga chiqmadi.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: Epidemiya Hindiston hukumatini jiddiy zararlangan hududlarga cho'chqa tutuvchilarni joylashtirish, minglab chivinga qarshi pardalarni tarqatish hamda pestitsidlarni sepish singari chora-tadbirlar ko'rishga undadi.

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: "Ularning issiqlik harakati ko'pincha muayyan haroratni doimiy saqlab turuvchi Yerdagi g'orlarga o'xshab barqaror emas, lekin yerdagi chuqur tuynuklar bilan mos keladi", dedi AQSH Geologik tadqiqotlar qo'mitasi astrologiya jamoasi va Arizonaning Flagstaff shahrida joylashgan Shimoliy Arizona universiteti vakili Glen Kushing.
hyp_text: Ularning issiqlik xatti katta yer ostida joylashgan qabristonlar kabi stabil emas, ammo bu yerlarda chuqurliklar ekanligi bilan mos, - dedi AQSh Geologiya Byurosi (USGS) Astrogeologiya jamoasi va Flagstaff, Arizonda joylashgan Shimoliy Arizona Universiteti a'zosi Glen Kushing.

src_text: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ref_text: "Men singlim va uning do'stini yo'qotib qo'ydim, yo'limda nogironlik aravachasidagi ikki nogiron kishi uchradi, odamlar shunchaki ularning ustidan sakrab va ularni itarib o'tayotgandi", dedi Armand Versache.

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Uch qirollik Qadimgi Xitoy davridagi eng qonli davrlardan biri bo'lib, minglab odamlar Sian shahrida joylashgan hashamatli saroydagi taxtga o'tirish maqsadida kurashib halok bo'lgan.
hyp_text: Uch Xonlik davri Eroning qadimgi tarixidagi eng qonli davrlardan biri edi, ming kishilar Xiyu shahridagi buyuk saroyda eng yuqori oʻrinni egallash uchun kurashgan.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: Buyuk piramida fir'avn Xufu sharafiga bunyod etilgan hamda ko'plab kichik piramidalar, maqbaralar va ma'badlar Xufuning xotinlari hamda oila a'zolarining sharafiga bunyod etilgan.
hyp_text: Buyuk piramida Xufu podshohi sharafiga qurildi va uning xotinlari va oila a'zolarini xotirlash uchun kichik piramidalari, qabrlari va ibodatxonalar qurildi.

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
ref_text: Beparvolik, baxtsiz hodisa yoki qasddan zo'ravonlik qilish orqali, voyaga yetayotganida kattalar tomonidan ijtimoiylashtirilmagan bolalar holatlaridan iborat kam sonli noxush holatlarini misol qilib keltirish ijtimoiylashuv muhimligini ko'rsatish uchun qo'llaniladigan keng tarqalgan usul hisoblanadi.
hyp_text: Bunday ijtimoiy moskelarning ahamiyatini tasdiqlash uchun eng ko'pinchi usul biri - bolalar, ularni kattalik davrida o'ylamaganlik, qadrlik yoki ishonch tug'ri ahvolida yetimlikda bo'lishgan, erkaklar tomonidan ijtimoiy moskelanmagan bolalarning qirq qadar holatlari bo'yicha ishlatiladi.

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.

hyp_text: Bu XXRningdagi eng muhim holatlaridan biri Shimoliy Atlantika kampaniyasi edi. AQShliklar Atlantika okeani bo'ylab odamlar va materiallarni o'tkazishga harakat qilmoqchi bo'lishgan, Buyuk Britaniyaga yordam berish uchun.

src_text: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
ref_text: Sharoit yaxshi bo'lsa, siz piyoda yurishdan ko'ra ko'proq masofani bosib o'ta olasiz, biroq faqat kamdan-kam hollarda tayyorlangan yo'llarda og'ir ryukzaksiz chang'ida tezlik olasiz.
hyp_text: Siz yaxshi sharoitda yurishdan ancha uzoqroq masofalarini bosib olishingiz mumkin, lekin o'zini yuklatmagan trekka ega bo'lsa ham, yomon yo'lalarda xalqaro trekka yaxshi tezliklarga erisha olmaydigan bo'lishingiz juda kamda kamroq bo'ladi.
